mapper.select: select diary_id, to_char(diary_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') diary_date, content from diary where diary_date = #{day} and delete_status = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY(DIARY_ID, DIARY_DATE, CONTENT, DELETE_STATUS) VALUES((select nvl(max(diary_id)+1,1) from diary), #{diary_date}, #{content}, 'N')
mapper.update: update diary set delete_status = 'D' where diary_id = #{diary_id}
update diary set content = #{content} where diary_id = #{diary_id}
